description:
Legendary weapons for original WARRIORS OROCHI officers will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Weapons for:
Dodomeki, Gyūki, Hundun, Diamondback, Zeus, Athena, Ares, Odin, and Perseus

■How to use
You can change Weapons from camp by selecting "Weapons" - "Equip Weapons".
name: Legendary Weapons Orochi Pack 3
